= Required software =

  * *[http://www.adobe.com/products/flex/flexdownloads/index.html Adobe Flex3 SDK]*
    Install it as described [http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Setup here]. Note links to detailed instructions at the bottom of the page.

  * *[http://labs.adobe.com/downloads/alchemy.html Adobe Alchemy]*
    Install it as described [http://labs.adobe.com/wiki/index.php/Alchemy:Documentation:Getting_Started here].

  * *[http://www.lua.org/download.html Lua 5.1.4 Sources]*
    Simply unpack it somewhere.

= Build steps =

  # Fire up you terminal (Cygwin shell if you're on Windows)

  # Change current directory to where you've unpacked Lua sources
  
{{{ 
    $ cd ~/lua-5.1.4 
}}}

  # Enable Alchemy tools

{{{ 
    $ alc-on 
}}}

  # Run make

{{{ 
    $ make generic 
}}}

  # That is it, Lua is compiled to Flash. Try it

{{{ 
    $ cd src
    $ ./lua
}}}
